headline: The Saturday Spread: Letting the Smart Money Act as an Early Warning Sign
summary: Since the most sophisticated market participants have access to resources that regular folks lack, their posture can clue us into potential sentiment swings.

headline: The Sell-Off In Gold May Be Last Stop Before $10,000 – 5 Stocks and an ETF To Buy Now
summary: The case for gold and gold miners is compelling for two reasons. Firstly, gold can serve as a strategic hedge against inflation. Secondly, some major miners extract silver, copper, and other essential metals for industrial applications, all of which have recently reached all-time highs. Spot gold has surged above the summer 2020 highs and, in ... The Sell-Off In Gold May Be Last Stop Before $10,000 – 5 Stocks and an ETF To Buy Now
